page.title: 06"Metheringham Police"
page.content: Metheringham is not a very big place but we still have a policeman. He helps the Youth Club Committee and goes around the village making sure that there is no mischief being caused by the teenagers.In the Autumn term the 4th. year Primary School children receive visits from a beat policeman, a police dog handler, the underwater search unit and the C.I.D. The children visit Lincoln Police Station to see the control room, the police vehicles and the cells. In the Summer the police organise a safe cycling course for 11 year olds.You have to learn riding skills, hand signals, traffic signs and the Highway Code.A certificate and a badge are awarded to children who pass a test at the end of the course.
